MemoryInfobox.name: Memorial Murder
MemoryInfobox.description: 'Wishing to deliver a bust of a late Leader, an artist feared provoking the wrath of the Followers of Ares, who had been openly opposed to the politician.'

General_Description: '''Memorial Murder''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: An artist sought the help of a [[mercenary]]. Kassandra answered.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
